name: ventStrength_setValue
description: This function is used to set the ventilation intensity of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the ventilation intensity.

parameters.name: predefinedVentStrength
parameters.description: The predefined strength to set for the ventilation (e.g., automatic, high, low, normal, turbo, weak).
